page.title: 06Farm Survey (cont)
page.content: The new owner of Mill Farm plans to convert the buildings into a house. The Lockerley Estate dairy is now under new ownership and is called Parklands Farm. This farm has a pedigree herd of 163 Fresian cows. Lockerley Hall Estate owns 180 acres of grazing land, 150 acres of woodland and 20 acres of gardens. The estate keeps 150 sheep, 120 beef cattle, 90 calves, 2000 pheasants and partridge. Also, 80 chickens are kept. The Hall is a private residence. Deangate Farmhouse is a private house and the land owned by Dean Hill Barn Farm. On Butts Green, there is a smallholding with four sheep, six lambs, a goat, ten bantams and six rabbits. They graze on 2.5 acres.
